lead_paragraph: Mr. Feelgood took the lead coming out of the final turn and held off Cactus Creek to win the Little Brown Jug in 1:503/5 yesterday in Delaware, Ohio. It is the second leg of the Triple Crown for 3-year-old pacers. Mr. Feelgood, the 9-5 favorite driven by Mark MacDonald, drew the No. 1 post position for the final but yielded the lead out of the starting gate. MacDonald won his first Jug by moving the colt from second to first down the stretch.
